title: HELP! Anyone know Sean Mayo or his ex Pick Up?

posts.content:
I am doing a feature about a lovely 65 Dove Blue Pick up which was fully restored to original condition (in 2013/14?) whilst a Sean Mayo owned it. Rugeley area I think.
I'd like to find out anything about its history and the top resto job done on it..and to credit those responsible for the workmanship. New owner does not have any of this info
Can anyone on here help?
David

Hello I am Sean mayo if you need any info on my old pick up email me on sean@mayo1.co.uk
Bit weird my brother in law sent me this link who lives in New Zealand .
